case.title: Argentinian tango dancer young lady look English tango friend! - 45 (SW1- LONDON)
case.text: Planning to move in to London in Aug/set. to dance in any milongas" at Central London area. Looking for some friend to meet and share some fun dancing Argentinian tango! Let me know if you're a good dancer Salon/milonguero" style & new tango style! And any pic of you dancing, I'll reply with some of me! thanks
